definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
a married couple allowed dispensation to have second child

sentences.english: The couple arrived at a plain first.
sentences.chinese: 這對夫婦先來到一個平原。

sentences.english: Thaksin and his wife, Pojaman, were in Beijing until Sunday for the opening of the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫婦在北京參加奧運開幕式，一直逗留到星期天。

sentences.english: One of the Murphys' neighbors also noticed 'unusual' traits.
sentences.chinese: 墨菲夫婦的一個鄰居也注意到他們與衆不同的特點。

sentences.english: This cook-shop was kept by some people named Thenardier, husband and wife.
sentences.chinese: 這客店是名叫德納第的夫婦倆開的。

sentences.english: I think David and Victoria Beckham are a perfect match.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲戴維貝克漢夫婦真是天生一對。

sentences.english: Pictured here: A couple walks through the Lavaux Vineyard Terraces along Lake Geneva in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲一對夫婦沿瑞士日內瓦湖在拉沃克斯葡萄園散步。

sentences.english: They were a quiet and fond couple.
sentences.chinese: 他們夫婦一向和和睦睦，相親相愛。

sentences.english: The young couple settled down in the Soba restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的夫婦把家安在了蕎麥麪館裏。

sentences.english: After picnic the children begin to fly kites. Mr. and Mr. Jackson go fishing by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 午餐後孩子們開始放風箏，傑克遜夫婦在湖邊釣魚。

sentences.english: " She gestured to a middle-aged couple holding hands. "Look at them.
sentences.chinese: 她指着一對手牽手的中年夫婦，“看看他們。

sentences.english: The couple had another daughter three months ago.
sentences.chinese: 三個月前這對夫婦又有了一個女兒。

sentences.english: Daredevil couple decided to vacation far out.
sentences.chinese: 冒失鬼夫婦決定遠出旅遊度假。

sentences.english: If the husband or the wife dies, may the other marry again?
sentences.chinese: 夫婦二人中死了一個，單夫寡婦還能婚配麼？

sentences.english: So Mrand Mrs. White took their children to the funfair Mr.
sentences.chinese: 因此，懷特夫婦帶着他們的孩子們去了遊樂場。

sentences.english: They were all dual-earner couples -- both husband and wife held full-time jobs.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象都是雙職工，即夫婦二人都有全職工作。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
